work.title: PDIS (Public Digital Innovation Space)
p: PDIS is a goveronment origanization in Taiwan, it also has another name: Executive Yuan - Ministry of Digital Audrey Tang's Office. We use new technology to improve public participation and open government. We want to increase citizen participation, so we set up a video streaming during meeting. Citizen can join meeting and share their experiment anywhrere. They only need to submit a question to sli.do(a real-time comment system)..

I am a member of code team and video team. I develop EWS-Calendar, PDIS Line Bot, and maintain our server, Sandstorm, Rocket.Chat. In this year, I also serve for Alternative Military Service. I learned a lot skills and how to collaborate with different people.

work.title: 91app (Nexdoor)
p:
Nexdoor is a famous App company in 2013, we build iOS/Android/Web for customer. In 2014, most of employee join new company 91 app.
          I was a iOS Engineer Intern when I was an undergraduate student in 2013.
